item.description:
A fantastic opportunity to make some serious money with very little money down will be discussed on January 30th at 9:00pm. A little late I know, but WELL worth it.
Our Speaker Blue-Moon Capital, will tell us how they offer Turn Key Investment opportunities to smaller investors like us (as opposed to D. Trump types).

They will explain that for as little as $5000 Down, you can experience tremendous returns with their proven methods of turn-key rental Investment properties. No need to rehab, and management is taken care of.

In fact Metro West Investors is so blown away by this program, that we will offer to partner up with our members and put up the down-payment. How's that for confidence?

That means for you- No Money Down!

After the presentation you will hear how this will work. However, even if you don't want to partner with us, it really is a great way to invest in emerging markets for very little risk.

Follow this link to register for the event:
Remember you MUST put Metro West Investors as your representative/referral when registering

Follow this link to register: https://www1.gotomeet...
item.how_to_find_us: Do NOT go to the Crowne Plaza - This seminar is a "Webinar"
item.why: This is a tremendous opportunity to make money in Real Estate. We will partner with you too!

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Low Money down Investment Webinar. Amazing Opportunity!!
